text: Fernand Guiot (7 August 1932 â€“ 26 June 2021) was a French-Belgian movie, television and stage actor. == Early life and Education == He was born in Namur. He studied at the Brussels Drama Conservatory. == Career == He is known for his role as Mr. Dubreuil in L'Aile ou la Cuisse by Claude Zidi . Guiot died in Paris on 26 June 2021, aged 88. == References == Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian television actors Category:Belgian stage actors Category:People from Namur (city)
title: Fernand Guiot
